messages.lowVelocity: Sustained low velocity in the last sprint

drillDown.monthInfo: This data represents the monthly performance metrics for the selected period.
drillDown.weekInfo: This data represents the weekly performance metrics for the selected period.

hero.title: Project Pulse
hero.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Project Analytics Dashboard
hero.description: A sophisticated, production-ready dashboard solution designed for modern development teams. Built with cutting-edge technologies and best practices, Project Pulse delivers real-time insights into project performance, team productivity, and operational metrics.

dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
dashboard.description: Comprehensive KPI monitoring with period comparison, interactive charts with drill-down capabilities, and real-time data visualization across 6 different chart types.

projects.title: Project Management
projects.description: Full CRUD operations with advanced filtering, search, and sorting. Track project status, priority, progress, and team assignments with an intuitive table interface.

team.title: Team Performance
team.description: Monitor individual and team metrics including velocity, on-time delivery rates, productivity, and active project assignments with comparative visualizations.

alerts.title: Smart Notifications
alerts.description: Real-time alert system with categorized notifications (warning, error, info), timestamp tracking, and intelligent risk detection for proactive project management.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full multi-language support (English/Spanish) with dynamic language switching, comprehensive translation coverage, and locale-aware formatting.

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Export projects, team data, alerts, and KPIs to CSV format with filtered data support for seamless integration with external tools and reporting systems.

goals.title: Project Goals & Objectives
goals.performance: Deliver exceptional performance with optimized rendering, efficient state management, and minimal bundle size.
goals.scalability: Build a scalable architecture that can handle growing data volumes and feature requirements without compromising performance.
goals.maintainability: Ensure code maintainability through clean architecture, comprehensive documentation, and adherence to industry best practices.
goals.userExperience: Provide an intuitive, responsive, and accessible user experience with smooth animations and consistent design patterns.
goals.codeQuality: Maintain high code quality standards with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and comprehensive testing coverage.
goals.accessibility: Implement accessibility best practices to ensure the application is usable by everyone, including users with disabilities.

component.title: Component-Based Architecture
component.description: Built with React's component model, featuring reusable, composable components with clear separation of concerns. Each component is self-contained with its own logic, styling, and state management where appropriate.

state.title: Centralized State Management
state.description: Zustand provides lightweight, performant state management with minimal boilerplate. State is organized by domain (projects, team, KPIs) with clear action boundaries and predictable updates.

styling.title: Utility-First Styling
styling.description: TailwindCSS enables rapid UI development with a consistent design system. Dark mode support is built-in with CSS variables for dynamic theme switching without page reloads.

i18n.title: Internationalization System
i18n.description: Custom i18n implementation with nested translation keys, parameter interpolation, and dynamic language switching. Translations are type-safe and organized by feature domain.

testing.title: Testing Strategy
testing.description: Vitest provides fast unit testing with React Testing Library for component testing. MSW enables API mocking for integration testing without backend dependencies.

code.title: Code Quality
code.typeScript: Full TypeScript coverage with strict mode enabled
code.eslint: ESLint configuration with React hooks and TypeScript rules
code.strict: Strict null checks and type safety throughout

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.memoization: React.memo and useMemo for expensive computations
performance.lazy: Code splitting and lazy loading for optimal bundle size
performance.optimization: Optimized re-renders with proper dependency arrays

ux.title: User Experience
ux.responsive: Mobile-first responsive design for all screen sizes
ux.darkMode: Seamless dark mode with system preference detection
ux.loading: Loading states and skeleton screens for better perceived performance
ux.feedback: Toast notifications and error handling for user feedback

maintainability.title: Maintainability
maintainability.modular: Modular file structure with clear separation of concerns
maintainability.reusable: Reusable components and custom hooks for code sharing
maintainability.documented: Comprehensive code comments and type definitions
maintainability.tested: Unit tests for critical business logic and utilities
